contentfulBlogPost.title: Unlock opportunities in digital marketing with 8 A/B Testing tips

body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"When it comes to digital marketing, yeah ok not all brands fail to implement A/B testing, but a lot do. A lot of marketeers say they don't have time, we leave everything to an agency, or admit it's just lack-of understanding and implementation.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"blockquote","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Marketeer: \"Great, but why should I care?\"","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Because it's what could make the difference between a good campaign, or a excellent one.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"So, what's there to take advantage of with A/B testing in the digital marketing space. Let's take a quick look...","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"hr","data":{},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"1. Improved Engagement","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Performing tests enable brands to understand what resonates better with target audience. Highlight what's engaging and effective marketing material, improving click-through, conversions, and customer engagement.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"2. Risk Reduction","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"By testing different variations, brands can reduce the risk of launching a poor performing campaign. This helps to reduce wasted resources, increase focus on importance, and improve ROI.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"3. Better User Experience (UX)","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Testing different designs, messaging, and strategies can provide insights that help improve UX. Which could lead to greater customer engagement, satisfaction, and loyalty.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"4. Data-driven Decisions","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Testing enables the ability for decisions based on data and insights, rather than guessing. This can improve the efficiency and effectiveness of marketing and campaign efforts.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"5. Increase Conversion Rates","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Brands can use testing to identify changes that can improve their conversion rates. This might involve testing different user journeys, buttons, copy, images, or other areas.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"6. Optimise Marketing Spend","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"By testing and understanding what works best, brands can assign budget to what's valuable, a higher return on investment.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"7. Understand your audience Better","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Regular testing can provide valuable insights into audience behaviour and preferences. These insights help to develop better target and personalised marketing strategies.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"and last, but certainly not least...","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"8. ALWAYS Test & Share","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Testing and sharing what's learnt can create a culture of experimentation and innovation within a business. By always testing, brands can stay ahead of marketing trends, competitors, and change in audience behaviour.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Furthermore, keep a historic view on how audience behaviour changes over time. Does the seasons, weather, or a global event impact these insights.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"hr","data":{},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"HINT:","marks":[{"type":"italic"},{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" ","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"Integrate and manipulate brand performance insight against the season, weather, and event insight. You'll create and gain new vantage points, and certainly spark something very powerful and exciting!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"hr","data":{},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Want to learn more or need support?","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Reach out and ask any questions you may have via a comment, ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://wa.me/message/WFGVYT6SEWKJD1"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"WhatsApp","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":", or by email ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"mailto:hello@dripfed.design"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"hello@dripfed.design","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\rStart next week knowing you have an unlimited design subscription at your disposal. More details at ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://dripfed.design/?utm_source=blog&utm_medium=post&utm_campaign=whathowfuture"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"dripfed.design","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
